question.title: Cannot resolve method 'builder' in class inheritance
question.body:
I have several classes that are using Lombok @Builder:

@Getter
@Setter
@Builder
public class ProcessingAccountResource extends ProcessingAccountDto {

    public ProcessingAccountResource() {
    }

    private String id;
    
    private ProcessingAccountDto cardConfiguration;
}
.....
@Builder
public class ProcessingAccountDto extends CardConfiguration  {

    public ProcessingAccountDto() {
    }

    private String id;
    public String type;

    @JsonProperty("sourceAuthority")
    private SourceAuthority sourceAuthority;
    private CardConfiguration cardConfiguration;
    private List<CardType> cardTypes;

    @Getter
    @Setter
    @Builder
    @AllArgsConstructor
    public static class CardType {

        public CardType() {
        }

        private ProcessingAccountDto.TypeOfCard type;
        private ApmAgreement revenueAgreement;
    }

    public enum BatchSecurityOptions {

    }

    public enum ProcessingAccountType {
        CARD,
        DD
    }

    public enum TypeOfCard {
        MC
    }

    public enum Category {
        CREDIT,
        DEBIT;
        public String getCategory() {
            return null;
        }
    }

    public enum Status {
    }

    public CardConfiguration getCardConfiguration() {
        return cardConfiguration;
    }
}

........

@Getter
@Setter
@Builder
public class CardConfiguration {

    public CardConfiguration() {
    }

    private String carId;

    private String carPassword;

    private List<CardType> cardType;

    private List<ProcessingAccountDto.CardType> cardTypes;
}

............
List<CardType> cardTypes = Optional.ofNullable(processingAccountResource)
        .map(ProcessingAccountDto::getCardConfiguration)
        .map(com.dto.CardConfiguration::getCardTypes)
        .orElse(null);

.....

CardConfiguration.builder().cardTypes(cardTypes).build()

I get the error:

  symbol:   method builder()
  location: class CardConfiguration

(please run the example project code below to see all errors)

This is because I have classes that are inherited with the Builder pattern.

Full code example: https://github.com/rcbandit111/ClassBuilderPoc/blob/main/src/main/java/com/test/core/web/rest/controller/Controller.java

How can I edit the classes without changing the code in Controller.java so that the code can be compiled and run?

EDIT: I tried to implement a solution with @SuperBuilder but I get the error: Required type: ProcessingAccountDto Provided: capture of ?

answers.body:
You're on the right track for using @SuperBuilder in your scenario. Quoting the docs:

The SuperBuilder annotation creates a so-called 'builder' aspect to the class that is annotated with @SuperBuilder, but which works well when extending. It is similar to @Builder, except it is only legal on types, is less configurable, but allows you to extends other builder-able classes.

However, it's hard to understand from your edit what changes you've made to get that error, but in order to make the annotation work, you need to apply @SuperBuilder on all the classes of the hierarchy.

So in your case, @SuperBuilder must replace @Builder on CardConfiguration, ProcessingAccountDto, and ProcessingAccountResource.

@Getter
@Setter
@SuperBuilder
public class ProcessingAccountResource extends ProcessingAccountDto {

    private String id;
    private String groupId;
    private String carAccountId;
    private ProcessingAccountDto cardConfiguration;
}

@JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL)
@JsonTypeName("processingAccounts")
@SuperBuilder
public class ProcessingAccountDto extends CardConfiguration  {

    ...
}

@Getter
@Setter
@SuperBuilder
public class CardConfiguration {

    private String carId;
    private String storePassword;
    private List<CardType> cardType;
    private List<ProcessingAccountDto.CardType> cardTypes;
}

I've also forked your project to apply the fix and created a pull request with the compiling code.
